description: The PAT_EXTERNAL_CVGS table contains insurance information imported into Epic from an external system. Each row in the table corresponds to a coverage a patient had in the external system.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_SRC_SYS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The external system that the insurance information was loaded from.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


MyChart


EpicCare Link


Welcome


RTE Response


Roster Management Engine


MyChart Guest


Interconnect Network


Yaqeen Register


Standalone Webservice

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The payor ID associated with the external insurance information.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The benefit plan ID associated with the external insurance information.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_INS_NAME
columns.description: The search string a registrar would enter in the search box when attempting to create a new coverage record. This string typically includes the payor name, plan name, or synonym used to refer to the payor or plan.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_SUBSCR_NUM
columns.description: The subscriber ID associated with the external insurance information.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_SUBSCR_NAM
columns.description: The name of the subscriber associated with the external insurance information.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_SUBSCR_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The birth date of the subscriber associated with the external insurance information.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_SUBS_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sex of the subscriber associated with the external insurance information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_MEM_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The relationship between the member and the subscriber associated with the external insurance information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Self


Spouse


Child


Employee


Unknown

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_MEM_NUM
columns.description: The member ID associated with the external insurance information.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_MEM_NAME
columns.description: The member name override for the patient associated with the external insurance information. This is an override for the patient name when the payor is expecting a different name.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_GROUP_NUM
columns.description: The group number associated with the external insurance information.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_RESP_ID
columns.description: The General Use Notes (HNO) ID or response text received from an eligibility query sent to verify the external coverage.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_CVG_ID
columns.description: The ID of the coverage created from the external insurance information.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action taken on the external insurance information.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Action Taken


Manually Flagged as Done


Eligibility Coverage Created


Eligibility Existing Coverage Used


Eligibility Response Ignored


Non-Eligibility Coverage Created

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_CREAT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when this external coverage was stored in Epic.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_EFF_FRM_DATE
columns.description: The date from which the external coverage is effective. This is meant to map to what we store in Effective Date From (I CVG 400).

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_EFF_TO_DATE
columns.description: The date to which the external coverage is effective. This is meant to map to what we store in Effective Date To (I CVG 410)

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_BIN
columns.description: The Beneficiary Identification Number (BIN) of the external coverage.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_PCN
columns.description: The processor control number (PCN) of the external coverage.

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_PERS_CODE
columns.description: The person code of the external coverage. This is meant to map to what we store in Member Person Code (I CVG 316).

columns.name: EXT_CVGS_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the encounter that created the coverage, if it was created in an encounter.
